title: Google logo
summary: The Google logo appears in numerous settings to identify the search engine company. Google has used several logos over its history, with the first logo created by Sergey Brin using GIMP. A revised logo debuted on September 1, 2015. The previous logo, with slight modifications between 1999 and 2013, was designed by Ruth Kedar, with a wordmark based on the Catull, an old style serif typeface designed by Gustav Jaeger for the Berthold Type Foundry in 1982.[1]
